fields.name: Navy Shantung Plain Tie
fields.description: The grenadine shantung silk for this tie is woven in the Lake Como area on historic wooden looms from the 20th century. It is made in a threefold construction with a perfectly balanced interlining. Due to an untipped construction this tie will make you stand out in relaxed sartorial elegance allowing a subtle elegant knot. Fully handmade in Italy from the best skilled artisans it is untipped with meticulously handrolled edges that require an absolute detail to perfection and experience in the manufacturing process.

fields.name: Navy & Grey Shantung Stripe Tie
fields.description: The grenadine shantung silk for our ties is woven in the Lake Como area on historic wooden looms from the 20th century. Versatile and understated this very special silk weave will always give an elegant twist to your outfit. Our grenadine shantung ties are made in a threefold construction with a perfectly balanced interlining. Due to an untipped construction this tie will make you stand out in relaxed sartorial elegance allowing a subtle elegant knot. Fully handmade in Italy from the best skilled artisans it is untipped with meticulously handrolled edges that require an absolute detail to perfection and experience in the manufacturing process.

fields.name: Black Silk Dot Tie
fields.description: Our black tie is made from an outstanding silk quality. It is made in a threefold construction with a perfectly balanced interlining allowing a perfect tie knot that is not bulky. Fully handmade in Italy from the best skilled artisans it is self-tipped having the blade tips closed with the same fabric used for making the tie.
